alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 30 at 9:08PM PST until January 31 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches above 5000 feet and 1 to 2 inches above 3500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels of near 4000 feet will lower to 3000 to 3500 feet early Tuesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
